summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PEON Dashboard. All 18 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI tests verified authentication, dashboard, admin panels (Features, Backup, Notifications, Audit), servers page, and feature toggle persistence. All requested features working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Created multiple backup files during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. Admin account 'testadmin' with password 'Test1234!' is available. Chat feature was toggled off/on during testing and is currently enabled.

authentication_login.notes: Login with testadmin/Test1234! works correctly, returns token and user info

authentication_logout.notes: Logout redirects to login page correctly

dashboard_home_page.notes: Shows Server Dashboard with stats (Total Servers, Running, Stopped, Usage), Online Users, Active Servers, Community Chat (when enabled), Gaming Sessions

admin_panel_features_tab.notes: Feature Toggles panel shows 4 toggles: Online Users, Community Chat, Gaming Sessions, Server Stats. Save Changes button works.

feature_toggle_chat_off.notes: Disabling Community Chat toggle hides chat section from home page immediately

feature_toggle_persistence.notes: After page reload, disabled chat remains hidden - persistence works correctly

admin_panel_backup_tab.notes: Backup & Restore panel shows: Create Backup, Upload Backup buttons, info box, backup list with Restore/Download/Delete actions

backup_creation.notes: Create Backup creates peon_backup_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.zip file that appears in list

admin_panel_notifications_tab.notes: Discord and Email tabs render correctly with all config fields

notifications_discord_config.notes: Discord tab shows: Webhook URL, Enable checkbox, Notify On options (Server Start/Stop, New Gaming Session, User Join Session), Send Test, Save buttons

notifications_email_config.notes: Email tab shows: SMTP Host/Port/Username/Password, From Email, Enable checkbox, Notify On options, Gmail App Password info note

admin_panel_audit_tab.notes: Audit Log shows entries with category filters (All, User, Server, Chat, Session, Auth, System), Refresh button, log entries with username, action, details, timestamp, IP

servers_page_no_duplicate_message.notes: 'No Orchestrators Configured' message appears exactly once (bug fix verified)

servers_page_add_orchestrator.notes: Add Orchestrator and Add Your First Orchestrator buttons visible

test_classes: TestAuthentication (4 tests): login_success, login_invalid_credentials, get_current_user, get_permissions

bugs_verified_fixed: Duplicate 'No Orchestrators Configured' message - FIXED (appears only once)
Chat toggle hides chat on home page - WORKING
